title: Inside Michael Bargo’s Brooklyn Heights Apartment
title_page: Inside Michael Bargo’s Brooklyn Heights Apartment - The New York Times
text: For the furniture dealer and interior designer Michael Bargo, home doubles as a showroom. His Brooklyn apartment is an intimate pastiche of items, some available to buy and others he won’t part with, such as this gilt wood mirror lined with postcards.
